criteria_results.notes: Branch selection implemented via WorktreeSelectionContext. Sidebar.tsx displays branch list, BranchListItem.tsx handles click events with isSelected state and visual highlighting (border-l-2 border-blue-500 on selected item). Verified by unit tests in sidebar.test.ts and component structure.

Toggle functionality implemented in SidebarContext.tsx with toggle() action. SidebarToggle.tsx provides toggle button. useSidebar.ts hook persists state to localStorage (key: 'sidebar-state'). AppShell.tsx applies width transition (w-72 to w-0). Verified by useSidebar.test.ts tests.

Branch status display implemented in BranchStatusIndicator.tsx with 4 statuses: idle (gray-500), running (green-500), waiting (yellow-500), generating (blue-500). Animation (animate-pulse) applied for non-idle states. toBranchItem() in sidebar.ts converts Worktree to display format. 22 tests verify all status colors and animations.

Mobile support implemented with useIsMobile.ts hook (breakpoint: 768px). AppShell.tsx renders mobile drawer layout when isMobile is true. Drawer defaults to hidden (-translate-x-full), opens with openMobileDrawer(), and closes on overlay click (closeMobileDrawer). Verified by useIsMobile.test.ts (12 tests).

evidence: BranchListItem renders clickable branch items with selection state
Selected branch highlighted with blue border (border-l-2 border-blue-500)
useSidebar hook persists state to localStorage
22 component tests verify all status variations
AppShell renders drawer layout on mobile

notes: All acceptance criteria have been verified through code review and unit test execution. The implementation provides a complete sidebar infrastructure with branch selection, toggle visibility, status indicators, and responsive mobile support. Total 52 sidebar-related tests pass successfully.
